titleStmt.title: God's love to man, and man's duty towards God: manifested in several discourses on the covenants of works and grace Wherein divers propositions are laid down, and sundry cases resolved. By John Barret, Minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Barret, John, 1631-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for S.R. and are to be sold by Jonathan Robinson, at the Golden Lion in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London, England.

place.placeName: the Golden Lion in St. Paul's Church-Yard
